snippet.title: Spacelords - Mikah Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
RAIDERS OF THE BROKEN PLANET is now SPACELORDS!
https://spacelordsthegame.com/news/raiders-of-the-broken-planet-reborns-as-spacelords

---

Meet Mikah, the latest Raider to join Harec’s team. Now available for Founders Pack owners, 10 days in advance of her official release to the Alien Myths campaign owners. Mikah is a two-army woman, using her unique “decoy” ability to advance on two fronts at the same time and lay ambushes to unwary enemies. A really valuable addition to the Raiders’ ranks… and a fearsome Antagonist.

---

Learn more about Spacelords: https://spacelordsthegame.com/
